rcCSSIncludes (  ) 

Adds links to css files Usage: <plug:rcCSSIncludes /> Note: css files can be added to plug using rcCSSIncludes_Add() helper function

rcCSSIncludes_Add ( $  dir,
$  filename,
$  mediaOrNil = "",
$  typeOrNil = "" 
)

Helper function to add CSS files to the rcCSSIncludes plugin

Parameters:
string dir Directory to load the css file from e.g. /web/css/
string filename CSS file to load e.g. reset.css
string mediaOrNil optional CSS media. Screen etc.
string typeOrNil optional CSS type. text/css etc.
rcDisablePage ( $  shouldDo  ) 

Disables Indexhibit so nothing is shown

Parameters:
string shouldDo TRUE or YES will disable the page
rcEmphasisSplit ( $  text,
$  split = "-" 
)

Splits a string on a character and add emphasise to the second part e.g. "The Client - The Project" will return "The Client <em>The Project</em>" can be used to use emphasis on project titles the split character will be used in the url still

Parameters:
string text text to be split and emphasised
string split the character to split the text on
rcJSDocReady (  ) 

Adds JS to the Document Ready JS in the HTML head Usage: <plug:rcJSDocReady /> Note: js can be added to plug using rcJSDocReady_Add() helper function

rcJSDocReady_Add ( $  js  ) 

Helper function to add Document Ready JS to the rcJSDocReady plugin

Parameters:
string js the js

$  filename 
)

Helper function to add JS files to the rcJSIncludes plugin

string dir Directory to load the js file from e.g. /web/js/

rcNoScript (  ) 

Adds noscriptcontent Usage: <plug:rcCSSIncludes /> Note: css files can be added to plug using rcCSSIncludes_Add() helper function

rcNoScript_Add ( $  content  ) 

Helper function to add content that will be all contained within a <noscript> tag

Parameters:
string content the content to be placed
rcPageIndex ( $  style = rcSTYLE_NO_SECTIONS_TITLES_DASH_SPLIT  ) 

Returns the index menu in a chosen style Usage: <plug:rcPageIndex rcSTYLE_INDEXHIBIT_SECTIONAL />

Parameters:
string style The style to format the menu
rcSpacerBox ( $  numberOfLines,
$  lineHeight = 15,
$  paddingBottom = 0 
)

An html element with the hight of a number of lines

Parameters:
int numberOfLines Number of the span shall span
int lineHeight Height of each line in pixels
int paddingBottom Padding at the bottom of the span

rcStripHTML ( $  str  ) 

Strings HTML tags from a string when used in a template with system template var it can be used below (forgetting the closing >) <plug:rcStripHTML <title%>

Parameters:
string str String to strip
